rules_text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast that spell. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order. Do this only once each turn.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Create two X/X green and blue Elemental creature tokens, where X is the number of differently named lands you control.
